item.title: Transformers 3 (dark of the moon) Megatron
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:24, topic:376783”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=472705.msg3458954#msg3458954 date=1294291423]
I’d like to note that acting does take certain levels of intelligence. Not necessarily the most in the world, but not everyone can design an entire personality in their mind and then execute it flawlessly. Then again, not all actors/actresses can do that either. If you look at the body language and microexpressions of actors/actresses, then compare them to the feelings they are portraying, you get a really good idea of whether they’re good at what they do. As far as I know, Olive Wilde is a better actress, though I haven’t seen a lot of her other works other than her role on House M.D. I don’t think the woman in transformers is that great of an actress, though.
[/quote]

Go see Tron Avail, all your expectations will be made possible!

I mean listen to the soundtrack in that, for one of their first soundtracks for a movie I’d put Daft Punk almost on par with Hans Zimmerman and Inception’s. Oh and the acting was great. First time director, can’t really be mad at the faulty plot but it’s whatever.[/quote]

<3

Read full topic

item.title: Transformers 3 (dark of the moon) Megatron
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Taharok:

I’d like to note that acting does take certain levels of intelligence. Not necessarily the most in the world, but not everyone can design an entire personality in their mind and then execute it flawlessly. Then again, not all actors/actresses can do that either. If you look at the body language and microexpressions of actors/actresses, then compare them to the feelings they are portraying, you get a really good idea of whether they’re good at what they do. As far as I know, Olive Wilde is a better actress, though I haven’t seen a lot of her other works other than her role on House M.D. I don’t think the woman in transformers is that great of an actress, though.

Go see Tron Avail, all your expectations will be made possible!

I mean listen to the soundtrack in that, for one of their first soundtracks for a movie I’d put Daft Punk almost on par with Hans Zimmerman and Inception’s. Oh and the acting was great. First time director, can’t really be mad at the faulty plot but it’s whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: Transformers 3 (dark of the moon) Megatron
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:22, topic:376783”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=472705.msg3458954#msg3458954 date=1294291423]
I’d like to note that acting does take certain levels of intelligence. Not necessarily the most in the world, but not everyone can design an entire personality in their mind and then execute it flawlessly. Then again, not all actors/actresses can do that either. If you look at the body language and microexpressions of actors/actresses, then compare them to the feelings they are portraying, you get a really good idea of whether they’re good at what they do. As far as I know, Olive Wilde is a better actress, though I haven’t seen a lot of her other works other than her role on House M.D. I don’t think the woman in transformers is that great of an actress, though.
[/quote]
What season is she in?

My opinion, it’ll be rubbish without Foxy, not cause she was good or anything, just that she was a main character and now she’s gone it just won’t be right.[/quote]
Yeah I agree, I’ll probably still see it anyways lol.

I’d like to note that acting does take certain levels of intelligence. Not necessarily the most in the world, but not everyone can design an entire personality in their mind and then execute it flawlessly. Then again, not all actors/actresses can do that either. If you look at the body language and microexpressions of actors/actresses, then compare them to the feelings they are portraying, you get a really good idea of whether they’re good at what they do. As far as I know, Olive Wilde is a better actress, though I haven’t seen a lot of her other works other than her role on House M.D. I don’t think the woman in transformers is that great of an actress, though.

item.description:

btw those chick are stupid as hell, you’d at least think Michael bay would go for maybe a more smart sexy chick than say uh idk some babe that lives off her beauty and cocain.
[/quote]
Who gives a fuck if she’s smart. You’re watching her on a screen for two hours not dating her.[/quote] yeah but they really ought to keep away from dialogue it ruins the movie[quote=“Taharok, post:20, topic:376783”]I’d like to note that acting does take certain levels of intelligence. Not necessarily the most in the world, but not everyone can design an entire personality in their mind and then execute it flawlessly. Then again, not all actors/actresses can do that either. If you look at the body language and microexpressions of actors/actresses, then compare them to the feelings they are portraying, you get a really good idea of whether they’re good at what they do. As far as I know, Olive Wilde is a better actress, though I haven’t seen a lot of her other works other than her role on House M.D. I don’t think the woman in transformers is that great of an actress, though. :P[/quote]
… k i see, but house is a TV show not a MOVIE there are 1000s of differences.
